content: बहुल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} ({%<ab>compar.</ab>%} बंहीयस्; {%<ab>superl.</ab>%} बंहिष्ठ) {@--1@} Thick, dense, compact. {@--2@} ({%a%}) Broad, wide, capacious; ({%b%}) ample, large. {@--3@} Abundant, copious, plentiful, much, numerous; अविनयबहुलतया <ls>K. 143.</ls> {@--4@} Numerous, manifold, many; <ls>Māl. 9. 18.</ls> {@--5@} Full of, rich or abounding in; जन्मनि क्लेशबहुले किं नु दुःखमतःपरं <ls>H. 1. 184</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 43.</ls> {@--6@} Accompanied or attended by. {@--7@} Born under the Pleiades. {@--8@} Dark, black. {@--9@} Comprehensive, variously applicable. --लः {@--1@} The dark half of a month (कृष्णपक्ष); प्रादुरास बहुलक्षपाछविः <ls>R. 11. 15</ls>; करेण भानोर्बहुलावसाने संधुक्ष्यमाणेव शशांखरेखा <ls>Ku. 7. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">4. 13.</ls> {@--2@} An epithet of fire. --ला {@--1@} A cow. {@--2@} Cardamoms. {@--3@} The indigo plant. {@--4@} The Pleiades (<ab>pl.</ab>). --लं {@--1@} The sky. {@--2@} White-pepper. --लं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Often, frequently; बहुलं छंदसि.
